variants.headline: Immaculate Period Country House with Modern Updates in Surrey Hills
variants.full_text: This beautifully finished detached country house extends to approximately 3,500 sq ft and sits within landscaped gardens of 0.75 acres in the Surrey Hills Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty. The property combines period charm with contemporary updates throughout its well proportioned accommodation. The entrance hall features original wooden flooring and leads to elegantly designed reception rooms with high ceilings and large sash windows. The sitting room benefits from an open fireplace and French doors opening directly onto the gardens. A separate dining room provides excellent proportions for formal entertaining, while a study offers additional reception space with fitted shelving and garden views. The heart of the home is the impressive open plan kitchen and dining area, featuring sleek granite worktops and a comprehensive range of integrated appliances. Floor to ceiling glass bi fold doors span the rear elevation, creating abundant natural light and direct access to the landscaped gardens. The kitchen includes a central island with breakfast bar seating and ample storage throughout. The first floor accommodates five double bedrooms, each with fitted wardrobes and excellent ceiling heights. The master bedroom suite measures over 20 ft in length and includes a dressing area plus en suite bathroom with separate shower enclosure. Two further bedrooms benefit from built in storage and views across the gardens, while the remaining bedrooms offer flexible accommodation for family or guests. The property includes three bathrooms in total, with the family bathroom featuring a separate bath and shower, plus an additional ground floor cloakroom. All bathrooms have been recently updated with contemporary fixtures and tiling. Externally, the mature landscaped gardens extend to approximately 0.75 acres and include established borders, specimen trees and expansive lawn areas. A paved terrace adjoins the house, ideal for outdoor dining and entertaining. The grounds provide excellent privacy and are beautifully maintained throughout. Practical features include a double garage with electric doors plus extensive driveway parking for multiple vehicles. The property benefits from oil fired central heating and is rated EPC C for energy efficiency. The Knowle enjoys a particularly desirable village location within the Surrey Hills, with excellent local amenities including cafes and shops just 0.3 miles away. The setting provides wonderful access to countryside walks and bridleways, while maintaining convenient links to larger towns. The village offers a strong sense of community while preserving the tranquil character that makes this area so sought after. This wonderfully presented family home combines generous accommodation with beautiful gardens in one of Surrey's most attractive locations.
key_features: Five double bedrooms with master en suite and dressing area
Large open plan kitchen/dining room with bi fold doors
Landscaped gardens extending to approximately 0.75 acres
Double garage and extensive driveway parking
Surrey Hills AONB location with village amenities nearby

variants.headline: Immaculate Period Country House with Beautiful Landscaped Gardens
variants.full_text: This immaculate five bedroom detached country house extends to approximately 3,500 sq ft and sits within beautifully landscaped gardens of approximately 0.75 acres in the heart of the Surrey Hills Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty. The property has been thoughtfully updated throughout while retaining its period charm and character features. The elegant entrance hall leads to wonderfully proportioned reception rooms featuring original fireplaces and large sash windows that flood the spaces with natural light. The principal reception room offers excellent proportions with lovely garden views, while a separate sitting room provides additional living space. Period features including exposed beams and original wooden flooring enhance the character throughout the ground floor. The heart of the home is the impressive open plan kitchen and dining room, beautifully finished with sleek granite worktops and fitted units. Floor to ceiling glass bi-fold doors open directly onto the landscaped gardens, creating a wonderful indoor outdoor flow. The kitchen features integrated appliances and a central island, with ample space for dining and entertaining. The first floor accommodates four generous double bedrooms, each with fitted wardrobes and period features. The master bedroom benefits from an en-suite bathroom with modern fixtures and fittings, while the family bathroom serves the remaining bedrooms with a contemporary white suite. A fifth double bedroom on the second floor offers flexible accommodation with beautiful countryside views. The landscaped gardens are particularly noteworthy, extending to approximately 0.75 acres with mature trees, established borders and expansive lawns. The grounds include various seating areas and a productive vegetable garden. A double garage provides secure parking alongside ample additional parking on the gravelled driveway. The property occupies a wonderful village location within Cranleigh, renowned for its excellent local amenities including independent shops, cafes and restaurants. The Surrey Hills Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty provides exceptional walking and cycling opportunities right from the doorstep. The village offers a strong sense of community while maintaining convenient access to larger towns and transport links. Internal viewing is essential to fully appreciate the quality of accommodation, beautiful condition throughout, and the stunning landscaped grounds that make this property particularly special. The combination of period character, modern updates and exceptional outdoor space creates a truly wonderful family home in one of Surrey's most desirable locations.
key_features: Five double bedrooms with master en-suite bathroom
Large open plan kitchen and dining room with bi-fold doors
Beautiful landscaped gardens extending to approximately 0.75 acres
Double garage with ample additional parking
Village location within Surrey Hills Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty

variants.headline: Immaculate Period Country House with Landscaped Gardens in Surrey Hills
variants.full_text: This beautifully finished detached country house extends to approximately 3,500 sq ft and sits within landscaped gardens of approximately 0.75 acres in the heart of the Surrey Hills Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty. The property has been thoughtfully updated throughout while retaining its charming period character. The impressive reception areas feature elegant proportions with abundant natural light flowing through original sash windows. The drawing room showcases exposed timber beams and an inglenook fireplace, while the separate dining room provides wonderful entertaining space with garden views. A comfortable study offers a quiet retreat with fitted bookshelves and period features. The heart of the home is the large open plan kitchen dining room, beautifully finished with handcrafted units and granite worktops. Floor-to-ceiling glass bi-fold doors open onto the terrace, creating excellent indoor outdoor flow for family living and entertaining. The kitchen features a central island, integrated appliances, and ample storage throughout. The first floor accommodates four double bedrooms, including the master suite which benefits from fitted wardrobes and a luxurious en-suite bathroom with separate shower enclosure. Two further well proportioned bedrooms share a family bathroom, while the fourth bedroom enjoys lovely garden views. All bedrooms feature excellent ceiling heights and original wooden floors. The second floor houses the fifth double bedroom with exposed roof timbers and dual aspect windows, served by a third bathroom. This floor offers excellent additional accommodation with potential for a home office or guest suite. The property sits within beautifully landscaped gardens extending to approximately 0.75 acres. The grounds feature mature trees, established borders, and expansive lawns providing complete privacy. A paved terrace runs along the rear of the house, while a separate seating area takes advantage of the afternoon sun. The gardens include a productive vegetable plot and greenhouse. Practical features include a double garage with electric doors and additional parking for several vehicles. The property benefits from oil fired central heating, mains electricity and water, with private drainage. Recent improvements include a replacement roof completed in 2019 and full redecoration throughout. The village location provides excellent access to local amenities including cafes and shops within walking distance. The property enjoys a particularly convenient position just 0.3 miles from the village center while maintaining complete privacy within its generous plot. Cranleigh offers excellent facilities including a mainline railway station with services to London, outstanding schools both state and independent, and numerous recreational opportunities within the surrounding Surrey Hills countryside. The location combines rural tranquility with practical accessibility to both Guildford and London.
key_features: Five double bedrooms including master with en-suite
Large open-plan kitchen/dining room with bi-fold doors
Beautiful landscaped gardens extending to approximately 0.75 acres
Double garage with electric doors and ample parking
Surrey Hills AONB location with excellent village amenities

warnings.message: Subjective term 'ideal' should be avoided or backed with evidence
warnings.suggestion: Replace 'ideal' with factual descriptions like 'well-maintained' or 'recently renovated'

warnings.message: Avoid absolute claims (never, always, every, all)
Superlatives should be backed by evidence

five double bedrooms, master with en-suite
large open-plan kitchen/dining room with bi-fold doors
period country house with modern updates
village location within surrey hills aonb
